title: Progressive Radio News Hour
content:
Catherine Austin Fitts is an investment advisor, entrepreneur, and former Assistant Secretary of Housing and Federal... <!--more--> Housing Commissioner under GHW Bush.
She’s also a former Managing Director and board member of the Wall Street firm, Dillon Read & Co.
, Inc.
She’s now editor of Solari.
com and runs Solari, Inc.
- an “online media company focused on ethical investment and preserving family wealth.
Long ago, (she) made a promise (never again to) act against the best interest (of her) own people (and to do her best) to leave a better world for generations to come.
” Her latest views on world and national issues will be discussed.
